page.title: 04Tourism.
page.content: We interviewed some of the tourists who come to Sidmouth. They said they enjoyed coming here because of the {beautiful scenery.}Most had been here before and found the sports facilities good, although the main attraction was the{beach. They also explored the beauty spots in the{surrounding area.}Sidmouth is obviously popular with those who want a relaxing, quiet holiday. The local people said that Sidmouth would be a very quiet place indeed without the tourists. They also realised how important the tourist industry is for providing many local people with{employment.
